actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to establish a national adoption information exchange system.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to establish a national adoption information exchange system, utilizing computers and other data processing methods to assist in the placement of children who are awaiting adoption, and in locating such children for prospective parents.

titles.title: A bill to establish a national adoption information exchange system.
